response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic vision. I look forward to hearing your response and potentially facilitating this transaction that could be mutually beneficial. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 9500}
